content: शौंड {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (डी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [शुंडायां सुरायां अभिरतः अण्] {@--1@} Addicted to drinking, fond of liquor. {@--2@} Excited, intoxicated, drunk &c. (fig); अनिकृतिनिपुणं ते चेष्टितं मानशौंड <ls>Ve. 5. 21</ls> ‘drunk with pride or very proud’. {@--3@} Skilled in (with <ab>loc.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab>); अक्षशौंड, दानशौंड &c.
